author: The Toowoomba Chronicle
title: Ground News - Firefighters Make Snow Angels During Winter Storm
text: Firefighters Make Snow Angels During Winter Storm Three firefighters took a break to enjoy heavy snowfall in Lebanon, Tennessee, on January 15, amid a Summary by The Toowoomba Chronicle [winter storm](https://ground.news/interest/winter-storm)warning. Video shared by the Lebanon Fire Department shows the trio lying in the snow and making angels during their storm coverage on Monday. “Good Morning from LFD Station 4 A-Shift!” the department wrote on Facebook. A winter storm warning was in effect until Tuesday morning, the National Weather Service said, with additional snow… 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] The Toowoomba Chronicle Firefighters Make Snow Angels During Winter Storm Three firefighters took a break to enjoy heavy snowfall in Lebanon, Tennessee, on January 15, amid a winter storm warning. Video shared by the Lebanon Fire Department shows the trio lying in the snow and making angels during their storm coverage on Monday. “Good Morning from LFD Station 4 A-Shift!” the department wrote on Facebook.
